title: NBA Playoffs Recap & Iverson Classic Preview w/ Jelani McCoy | WHAT’S BURNIN | Showtime Basketball
itunes:title: NBA Playoffs Recap & Iverson Classic Preview w/ Jelani McCoy | WHAT’S BURNIN | Showtime Basketball
description:
Brand new WHAT'S BURNIN is live. Stak is joined by Jelani McCoy to recap the first round of the playoffs so far, including the Nets epic collapse. Plus, they preview the 2022 Iverson Classic which will be LIVE on CBS Sports Network this Saturday. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
